Author: Tralala26
Text: Yes you have the right mindset! I totally feel you on this one. You’re exactly right you just need to pick yourself up and start a new day tomorrow. This week I have gone AT LEAST 1,000 cals over every day :((( it’s discouraging but we can still fix this! Just be careful not to restrict too much because then you’ll get stuck in a cycle. You’ve got this! ❤️
